price: Yεkaa sε: “Noa, fa asomdwoeε a efri Yεn nkyεn siane si fͻm; na nhyira wͻ wo ne nnipa a wͻka wo ho no so, ne wͻn a wͻfri wͻn mu (anaasε wͻn asefoͻ) no mu bi; na nnipa no mu bi nso Yεbεma wͻn agye wͻn ani (berε tiaa bi) na afei asotwee yaaya a efri Yεn hͻ ato wͻn.
arabic: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَۚ وَأُمَمٞ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qīla yānūḥu ih'biṭ bisalāmin minnā wabarakātin ʿalayka waʿalā umamin mimman maʿaka wa-umamun sanumattiʿuhum thumma yamassuhum minnā ʿadhābun alīmun
